formattedAddress: 25 Washington Square N, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 25 Washington Square N, New York, NY 10011-9221, USA

originalText.text:
I’d first like to say “A Huge Thank You” and give a “Huge Round Of Applause” to America’s Singing Telegrams!!!

America’s Singing Telegrams did a fantastic job and helped make sure that my wife and I had a wonderful Valentines Day Celebration!!!

Our sensational singing telegram artist was Bernard and he delivered a stunning and breathtaking musical performance for my wife.

Bernard’s performance was amazing and it certainly brought my wife to tears. Bernard was unquestionably great, impeccably polite and courteous, and definitely a “First Class” professional. I highly recommend for all customers, and no matter the event (Christmas, Birthday’s, Anniversaries and of course Valentine’s Day Events) select and choose Bernard to perform at their special event.

I also definitely have to thank John, the organization’s leader for his great customer service and for offering me a great affordable package.

All in All, if you are looking to utilize a great singing telegram service, then look no further America’s Singing Telegrams!!!
